Workspaces

< Managing Drafts

PRO

Drafts allows you filter and configure various options related to the draft list. Configuring those filters is covered in another article. Workspaces allow you to save and apply a set of list configuration and filtering options.

Think of a workspaces as a macros which applies a set of filters and options to the draft list.
